languages.text: "Как видишь, не только ими. Еще я пел им славные песни о жестокости офицеров, черствости Лорд-капитана и отваге славного Немезита. Кому есть дело до жалкого флейтиста, у которого всегда найдется пара пайковых талонов на взятку блюстителю? Прятаться в тенях твоего прогнившего царства было так просто".

"Not only them, as you can see. I also sang glorious songs about the cruelty of the officers, the callousness of the Lord Captain, and the bravery of the selfless Nemesite. Nobody ever notices the pathetic little flute player who always carries a few ration cards for bribing enforcers, do they? Hiding in the shadows of your rotten kingdom was far too easy."
languages.original_text: "Как видишь, не только ими. Еще я пел им славные песни о жестокости офицеров, черствости Лорд-капитана и отваге славного Немезита. Кому есть дело до жалкого флейтиста, у которого всегда найдется пара пайковых талонов на взятку блюстителю? Прятаться в тенях твоего прогнившего царства было так просто".

traits.locale_text: "Not only them, as you can see. I also sang them glorious songs about the cruelty of the officers, the callousness of the Lord Captain, and the bravery of the glorious Nemesite. Who cares about a pathetic flute player who always has a couple of ration coupons to bribe the enforcers with? Hiding in the shadows of your rotten kingdom was so easy."

"Not only them, as you can see. I also sang them glorious songs about the cruelty of the officers, the callousness of the Lord Captain, and the bravery of the glorious Nemesite. Who cares about a pathetic flute player who always has a couple of ration coupons to bribe the enforcers with? Hiding in the shadows of your rotten kingdom was so easy."

"Not only them, as you can see. I also sang glorious songs about the cruelty of the officers, the callousness of the Lord Captain, and the bravery of the glorious Nemesite. Nobody ever notices the pathetic little flute player who always carries a few ration coupons for bribing enforcers, do they? Hiding in the shadows of your rotten kingdom was far too easy."

"Not only them, as you can see. I also sang glorious songs about the cruelty of the officers, the callousness of the Lord Captain, and the bravery of the glorious Nemesite. Nobody ever notices the pathetic little flute player who always carries a few ration coupons for bribing enforcers, do they? Hiding in the shadows of your rotten kingdom was far too easy."

"Not only them, as you can see. I also sang glorious songs about the cruelty of the officers, the callousness of the Lord Captain, and the bravery of the selfless Nemesite. Nobody ever notices the pathetic little flute player who always carries a few ration cards for bribing enforcers, do they? Hiding in the shadows of your rotten kingdom was far too easy."

"Not only them, as you can see. I also sang glorious songs about the cruelty of the officers, the callousness of the Lord Captain, and the bravery of the selfless Nemesite. Nobody ever notices the pathetic little flute player who always carries a few ration cards for bribing enforcers, do they? Hiding in the shadows of your rotten kingdom was far too easy."

languages.text: "Nicht nur wie sie, wie Ihr seht. Ich habe auch prächtige Lieder über die Grausamkeit der Offiziere gesungen, über die Gleichgültigkeit des Lord Captain und über die Tapferkeit des selbstlosen Nemesit. Niemand bemerkt den jämmerlichen kleinen Flötenspieler, der immer einige Rationenkarten bei sich hat, um Enforcer zu bestechen, nicht wahr? Mich in den Schatten Eures verrotteten Königreichs zu verstecken, war viel zu einfach."
languages.original_text: "Not only them, as you can see. I also sang glorious songs about the cruelty of the officers, the callousness of the Lord Captain, and the bravery of the selfless Nemesite. Nobody ever notices the pathetic little flute player who always carries a few ration cards for bribing enforcers, do they? Hiding in the shadows of your rotten kingdom was far too easy."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht nur wie sie, wie Ihr seht. Ich habe auch prächtige Lieder über die Grausamkeit der Offiziere gesungen, über die Gleichgültigkeit des Lord Captain und über die Tapferkeit des ruhmreichen Nemesit. Niemand bemerkt den jämmerlichen kleinen Flötenspieler, der immer ein paar Essensmarken dabei hat, um Enforcer zu bestechen, nicht wahr? Mich in den Schatten Eures verrotteten Königreichs zu verstecken, war viel zu einfach."

languages.text: «No solo ellos, como puedes ver. También he cantado canciones gloriosas sobre la crueldad de los oficiales, la brutalidad de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán y el valor del magnánimo Nemesitio. Nadie se fija nunca en el patético flautista que siempre lleva encima unas tarjetas de racionamiento para sobornar a los guardias, ¿no? Esconderse en las sombras de tu reino corrupto es extremadamente fácil».
languages.original_text: "Not only them, as you can see. I also sang glorious songs about the cruelty of the officers, the callousness of the Lord Captain, and the bravery of the selfless Nemesite. Nobody ever notices the pathetic little flute player who always carries a few ration cards for bribing enforcers, do they? Hiding in the shadows of your rotten kingdom was far too easy."

traits.locale_text: «No solo ellos, como puedes ver. También he cantado canciones gloriosas sobre la crueldad de los oficiales, la britalidad de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán y el valor del magnífico Nemesitio. Nadie se fija nunca en el patético flautista que siempre lleva encima unas tarjetas de racionamiento para sobornar a los guardias, ¿no? Esconderse en las sombras de tu reino corrupto es extremadamente fácil».

languages.text: 「見ての通り、あれだけではありません。士官たちの残酷さ、ロード・キャプテンの無慈悲さ、そして無私無欲のネメサイトの勇敢さについても、栄光の歌を歌いました。いつもエンフォーサーに渡す賄賂用の配給カードを数枚持ち歩いている程度の哀れなフルート吹きは、誰も気にもとめないでしょう？あなたの腐った王国の影に隠れるのは、あまりにも簡単でしたよ」
languages.original_text: "Not only them, as you can see. I also sang glorious songs about the cruelty of the officers, the callousness of the Lord Captain, and the bravery of the selfless Nemesite. Nobody ever notices the pathetic little flute player who always carries a few ration cards for bribing enforcers, do they? Hiding in the shadows of your rotten kingdom was far too easy."

traits.locale_text: 「見ての通り、あれだけではありません。士官たちの残酷さ、ロード・キャプテンの無慈悲さ、そして栄光のネメサイトの勇敢さについても、栄光の歌を歌いました。いつもエンフォーサーに渡す賄賂用の配給カードを数枚持ち歩いている程度の哀れなフルート吹きは、誰も気にもとめないでしょう？あなたの腐った王国の影に隠れるのは、あまりにも簡単でしたよ」

languages.text: “如你所见，不仅仅只有这些。我还唱过许多光荣的战斗歌曲，控诉那些军官有多么残忍，领主舰长有多么冷酷，歌颂无私的涅墨斯特有多么勇敢。那个可怜的小吹笛人总是会随身带着几张配给卡，打点那些执法者。根本没人注意过他，是吧？想要躲藏在你腐朽王国的阴影之中，这实在是太容易了。”
languages.original_text: "Not only them, as you can see. I also sang glorious songs about the cruelty of the officers, the callousness of the Lord Captain, and the bravery of the selfless Nemesite. Nobody ever notices the pathetic little flute player who always carries a few ration cards for bribing enforcers, do they? Hiding in the shadows of your rotten kingdom was far too easy."

traits.locale_text: “如你所见，不仅仅只有这些。我还唱过许多光荣的战斗歌曲，控诉了那些军官有多么残忍，领主舰长有多么冷酷，也歌颂了光辉的涅墨斯特有多么勇敢。那个可怜的小吹笛人总是会随身带着几张配给卡，打点那些执法者。根本没人注意过他，是吧？想要躲藏在你腐朽王国的阴影之中，这实在是太容易了。”

languages.text: « Pas seulement, comme vous pouvez le voir. J'ai aussi chanté d'inoubliables ballades sur la cruauté des officiers, l'inhumanité {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} et la bravoure de Némésite le Désintéressé. Personne n'a jamais remarqué le pathétique joueur de flûte qui avait toujours quelques cartes de rationnement pour corrompre les prévôts. Rien n'a été plus facile que me cacher dans les ombres de votre royaume pourri. »
languages.original_text: "Not only them, as you can see. I also sang glorious songs about the cruelty of the officers, the callousness of the Lord Captain, and the bravery of the selfless Nemesite. Nobody ever notices the pathetic little flute player who always carries a few ration cards for bribing enforcers, do they? Hiding in the shadows of your rotten kingdom was far too easy."

traits.locale_text: « Pas seulement, comme vous pouvez le voir. J'ai aussi chanté d'inoubliables ballades sur la cruauté des officiers, l'inhumanité {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} et la bravoure du glorieux Némésite. Personne n'a jamais remarqué le pathétique joueur de flûte qui avait toujours quelques cartes de rationnement pour corrompre les prévôts. Rien n'a été plus facile que me cacher dans les ombres de votre royaume pourri. »

languages.text: "Gördüğün üzere yalnızca onları eğlendirmedim. Aynı zamanda subayların gaddarlığına, Lord Kaptan'ın duyarsızlığına ve fedakâr Nemezit'in cesaretine dair harikulade şarkılar da söyledim. Kimse infazcılara rüşvet vermek için yanında üç beş kumanya kartıyla dolanan zavallı bir flütçüyü önemsemez, değil mi? Çürüyen krallığının gölgelerinde saklanmak, haddinden fazla kolay oldu."
languages.original_text: "Not only them, as you can see. I also sang glorious songs about the cruelty of the officers, the callousness of the Lord Captain, and the bravery of the selfless Nemesite. Nobody ever notices the pathetic little flute player who always carries a few ration cards for bribing enforcers, do they? Hiding in the shadows of your rotten kingdom was far too easy."
